RegionVocabulary.name: OECD DAC
RegionVocabulary.description: Supra-national regions according to OECD DAC CRS recipient codes

RegionVocabulary.name: UN
RegionVocabulary.description: Supra-national regions maintained by UN Statistics Division (M49 standard)

RegionVocabulary.name: Reporting Organisation
RegionVocabulary.description: The region reported corresponds to a region vocabulary maintained by the reporting organisation for this activity.
